name: Hey Yasha
greetingText: I know i call you many names but the most important one being Mom!
wishText: Today, I just want to take a moment to tell you how much I love and appreciate you. Your love and support mean everything to me, and I'm so grateful to have you in my life.Thank you for your kindness, your wisdom, and your endless love. Happy Valentine's Day, Mom! I love you more than you'll ever know.
